description.brief: Lead the frontend design and development of the second-generation actuarial system, focusing on modern UI/UX principles, performance optimization, and seamless integration with backend services to enhance user experience and operational efficiency.
In charge of developing frontend development of Lumine AI
details: As a Frontend Lead of the AI Team, I am responsible for the backend and chat interface development. Initially assisted in project understanding while the interface was outsourced due to political factors. Provided examples and stacks for the chat interface, but the delivered code, particularly for the backend, was nearly unusable. To address this, I proposed and led a complete rewrite alongside the UX/UI designer within one month, resolving package EOL issues and ensuring successful deployment.

Developed the IOPENMall customer service chatbot. Due to manpower considerations for this project, I was required to step in for backend development. Given that the frontend engineers were proficient in React.js, the project's frontend and backend architecture, along with initial development, were completed using React.js, Typescript, and Socket.io. The project was successfully handed over to the frontend engineers and the Project Manager (PM), and subsequently launched.

description.brief: Develop official website and APP backend website
details: Fully remote, build Official web site https://www.gumhk.com/zh-HK (Next.js, Typescript, MUI), mobile app backend dashboard (Next.js, Typescript, MUI) with full-stack developer.
